experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Project Title: “Semi-Automated Defect Inspection in Castings using Deep Convolutional Neural Networks”Guide: Prof. Bugra Alkan• Objective: Detection and segmentation of casting defects with deep CNNs. • Metrics: Accuracy (Classification), mAP (Object Detection).• Achieved 96.92% accuracy in the classification task with an 11-layer CNN network consisting of Convolutional, Pooling and FC layers.• Annotated defects with CVAT and Roboflow tools. Implemented various pre-trained models of EfficientDet family with the TensorFlow API.
experience.description_html: Project Title: “Semi-Automated Defect Inspection in Castings using Deep Convolutional Neural Networks”Guide: Prof. Bugra Alkan• Objective: Detection and segmentation of casting defects with deep CNNs. • Metrics: Accuracy (Classification), mAP (Object Detection).• Achieved 96.92% accuracy in the classification task with an 11-layer CNN network consisting of Convolutional, Pooling and FC layers.• Annotated defects with CVAT and Roboflow tools. Implemented various pre-trained models of EfficientDet family with the TensorFlow API.

experience.title: Computer Vision Intern
experience.description: Project Title: Automated Classification of Ulcerative Colitis Severity from Endoscopic ImagesGuide: Prof. Debdoot Sheet• Objective: Development of neural network models for the classification of the captured endoscopic images based on anatomical locations.• Metrics: Accuracy, F1Score. • Explored image enhancement techniques like the NBI, FICE, i-Scan used in the endoscopy (dye-less chromoendoscopy).• Concluded 0.82 F1Score on the Kvasir Dataset after fine-tuning the various versions of VGGNet, EfficientNet, XceptionNet, and ResNet.
experience.description_html: Project Title: Automated Classification of Ulcerative Colitis Severity from Endoscopic ImagesGuide: Prof. Debdoot Sheet• Objective: Development of neural network models for the classification of the captured endoscopic images based on anatomical locations.• Metrics: Accuracy, F1Score. • Explored image enhancement techniques like the NBI, FICE, i-Scan used in the endoscopy (dye-less chromoendoscopy).• Concluded 0.82 F1Score on the Kvasir Dataset after fine-tuning the various versions of VGGNet, EfficientNet, XceptionNet, and ResNet.

experience.title: AI Intern
experience.description: • Extracted useful structured data and texts using OCR/Non-OCR techniques from different resumes provided in various file formats.• Built a User-Query-based resume ranking system, where the resumes were ranked given keywords, using Spacy and RegEx libraries.• Deployed specific profile relevant extraction of information using NER (Named Entity Recognition) method using the NLTK Python library.• Stationed a web scrapper using Beautiful Soup that extracted user information from LinkedIn and profile information from the Wikipedia.
experience.description_html: • Extracted useful structured data and texts using OCR/Non-OCR techniques from different resumes provided in various file formats.• Built a User-Query-based resume ranking system, where the resumes were ranked given keywords, using Spacy and RegEx libraries.• Deployed specific profile relevant extraction of information using NER (Named Entity Recognition) method using the NLTK Python library.• Stationed a web scrapper using Beautiful Soup that extracted user information from LinkedIn and profile information from the Wikipedia.

education.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
